author: Rub√©n Criado
title: La NASA avisa: China tiene en sus manos cambiar la rotaci√≥n de la Tierra con una simple acci√≥n - AS.com
text:
Pixabay En los √∫ltimos a√±os, China ha pasado de ser una econom√≠a emergente, a ser una potencia mundial de pleno derecho. Desde el a√±o 2014 su PIB se ha duplicado y su crecimiento econ√≥mico anual fue del 5,2% el pasado 2023 y en los dos primeros trimestres de este a√±o su crecimiento medio ha sido del 5%.
Para lograr este desarrollo, Pek√≠n sab√≠a que ten√≠a, entre otras cosas, que mejorar las infraestructuras y en 1980 el gobierno chino puso encima de la mesa un proyecto ideado 50 a√±os atr√°s, pero que no se hab√≠a ejecutado por falta de fondos: construir una enorme presa en el r√≠o Yagnts√©, el tercer r√≠o m√°s grande del mundo en cuanto a caudal y longitud.
Desde que la Asamblea China present√≥ el proyecto hasta que comenzaron las obras pasaron 14 a√±os. En 1994 se iniciaron oficialmente las obras para la construcci√≥n de la presa de las Tres Gargantas , llamada as√≠ por los tres estrechos valles de los que bebe el r√≠o Yangtse, las gargantas de Qutang, Wu y Xiling.
Podr√≠a ralentizar la rotaci√≥n terrestre Sin embargo, la NASA advirti√≥ de las consecuencias que tendr√≠a llenar de agua esta enorme presa, entre ellas, la posibilidad de que pudiera provocar una desaceleraci√≥n en la rotaci√≥n de la Tierra. Los propios cient√≠ficos de la NASA realizaron esta afirmaci√≥n a ra√≠z del terremoto que tuvo lugar en el Oc√©ano √çndico del a√±o 2004.
‚ÄúEse cambio de masa aumentar√≠a la duraci√≥n del d√≠a en s√≥lo 0,06 microsegundos y har√≠a que la Tierra fuera s√≥lo un poco m√°s redonda en el centro y plana en la parte superior‚Äù, sugiere la publicaci√≥n de la agencia norteamericana publicada en 2005. En el caso del sismo que tuvo lugar hace 20 a√±os, los expertos aseguraron que este ‚Äúredujo la duraci√≥n de un d√≠a en 2,68 microsegundos‚Äù.
Una obra fara√≥nica 18 a√±os despu√©s, en 2012, la obra estaba completamente terminada, aunque desde 2009 la central hidroel√©ctrica generaba energ√≠a a completo rendimiento . Tiene m√°s de dos kil√≥metros de longitud y 185 metros de alto , lo que la hacen convertirse en la central hidroel√©ctrica m√°s grande del mundo y por consiguiente, la que m√°s energ√≠a genera. Con sus 32 turbinas es capaz de generar m√°s 80.000 millones de kilovatios hora en todo un a√±o, lo que significa todo un hito energ√©tico al tratarse de energ√≠a renovable.
Ampliar Ascensor para barcos en la presa de las Tres Gargantas Adem√°s del complejo sistema de generaci√≥n de energ√≠a, la presa cuenta con un sistema de esclusas para el llevar a los barcos de un lado al otro del r√≠o, al ser este una de las principales rutas fluviales entre el interior de China y la costa. Adem√°s de las esclusas, que ayudan a superar los 110 metros de desnivel entre un lado y otro del r√≠o, se ha construido un ascensor de barcos , capaz de en menos de una hora elevar un barco de 3000 toneladas, mientras con el sistema de esclusas el tr√°mite dura unas cuatro horas.
39.300 hect√≥metros c√∫bicos de agua. La capacidad m√°xima de la presa es de 39 billones de litros de agua y el cauce se extiende 600 kil√≥metros hacia arriba . Esta cantidad de agua ha tenido enormes consecuencias para el paisaje y la poblaci√≥n que viv√≠a a las orillas del Yangts√© y en √∫ltimo lugar a la rotaci√≥n de la tierra .
Seg√∫n un estudio de la NASA, esta acumulaci√≥n tan masiva de agua hace que la duraci√≥n de los d√≠as se alargue 0.06 microsegundos , haciendo que la tierra sea m√°s plana en los polos y algo m√°s redonda en el ecuador. Adem√°s de modificar la posici√≥n de los polos 2 cent√≠metros .

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Illinois babysitter accused of stabbing 2 children in her care
text: LISLE, Ill. (TCD) -- A 51-year-old babysitter stands accused of stabbing two girls, ages 4 and 1, while babysitting the children in their home. According to the DuPage County State‚Äôs Attorney's Office, on Nov. 17, shortly after 5 p.m., the Lisle Police Department responded to a report of a suicide attempt at a home on Matson Lane. At the scene, officers found a young girl in the bathroom covered in blood. Police observed the other child sitting on the kitchen floor covered in blood as well. Police located the girls' babysitter, Jennifer Kouchoukos, wearing blood-soaked clothing. She was reportedly in the bathroom where the first child was found. The two children were rushed to a local hospital and later transferred to Comer Children's Hospital in Chicago. Officials also transported Kouchoukos to a hospital for medical treatment. Further investigation revealed Kouchoukos allegedly stabbed the girls multiple times in their back and chest areas while babysitting them. Police reportedly recovered blood-stained knives at the scene, as well as an empty bottle of wine and a nearly empty bottle of rum. Following her release from the hospital, Kouchoukos was booked into the DuPage County Jail. DuPage County State‚Äôs Attorney Bob Berlin and Lisle Chief of Police Kevin Licko said Kouchoukos appeared in court on Wednesday, Dec. 27, and was charged with two counts of attempted first-degree murder, two counts of aggravated battery to a child under 13, and two counts of aggravated battery with a deadly weapon. Kouchoukos was denied pretrial release, and the State filed a motion for a psychiatric evaluation of her. She is scheduled to appear in court again on Jan. 12, 2024, for her arraignment. The state's attorney's office did not disclose the children's current condition. Berlin said in a statement, "This is an extremely disturbing case for all those involved." Licko added, "What a horrific incident our officers were faced with, I cannot praise them enough." TRUE CRIME DAILY: THE PODCAST covers high-profile and under-the-radar cases every week. Subscribe to our YouTube page and don‚Äôt forget to follow us on Instagram , Facebook , and Twitter. You can also subscribe to our True Crime Daily newsletter.

author: GB Times
title: How to stop popup ads on Facebook?
text:
How to Stop Popup Ads on Facebook?
As a Facebook user, you may have noticed that popup ads have become increasingly prevalent on the platform. These ads can be frustrating and intrusive, disrupting your browsing experience and wasting your time. In this article, we will provide you with a comprehensive guide on how to stop popup ads on Facebook.
Why are Popup Ads on Facebook?
Before we dive into the solutions, it‚Äôs essential to understand why popup ads appear on Facebook. The primary reason is that Facebook uses cookies to track your browsing behavior and target you with relevant ads. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device and contain information about your online activities. When you interact with a website or social media platform, your browser sends the cookie to the website‚Äôs server, which can then use that information to personalize your experience.
How to Stop Popup Ads on Facebook?
Stopping popup ads on Facebook is a straightforward process. Here are some effective methods to eliminate these annoying ads:
Table of Contents
Toggle
Method 1: Ad Blockers Method 2: Browser Extensions Method 3: Disabling Cookies Method 4: Using a VPN Method 1: Ad Blockers
Ad Blockers are a Saviors
Ad blockers are software programs that block ads from loading on your browser. They can be downloaded and installed on your device, and they are highly effective in stopping popup ads on Facebook.
uBlock Origin : A popular ad blocker that is highly effective in blocking popup ads on Facebook.
AdBlock Plus : A well-known ad blocker that blocks ads on Facebook and other websites.
Ghostery : A lightweight ad blocker that blocks ads and tracks your online activities.
Method 2: Browser Extensions
Browser Extensions to the Rescue
Browser extensions are add-ons that can be installed on your browser to block popup ads on Facebook. Here are some effective browser extensions:
Facebook Ad Blocker : A browser extension specifically designed to block ads on Facebook.
NoCoin : A browser extension that blocks ads and cryptocurrency mining scripts on Facebook.
uBlock Origin Browser Extension : A browser extension version of the popular ad blocker.
Method 3: Disabling Cookies
Disabling Cookies: A Temporary Solution
Disabling cookies on your browser can temporarily block popup ads on Facebook. However, keep in mind that disabling cookies may affect your Facebook experience, as cookies are used to personalize your experience.
Chrome : Click on the three vertical dots in the top right corner, then select "Settings" > "Advanced" > "Content settings" > "Cookies" and toggle off "Allow sites to save and read cookie data."
Firefox : Click on the three horizontal lines in the top right corner, then select "Options" > "Privacy & Security" > "Cookies" and toggle off "Accept cookies from sites."
Method 4: Using a VPN
Using a VPN: A Long-Term Solution
Using a Virtual Private Network (VPN) can be a long-term solution to stop popup ads on Facebook. VPNs encrypt your internet traffic and mask your IP address, making it difficult for Facebook to track your online activities and target you with ads.
ExpressVPN : A popular VPN service that encrypts your internet traffic and blocks ads.
NordVPN : A VPN service that offers ad-blocking features and encrypts your internet traffic.
Additional Tips
Here are some additional tips to help you stop popup ads on Facebook:
Use a reputable antivirus software : Installing a reputable antivirus software can help protect your device from malware that may be used to track your online activities.
Keep your browser up-to-date : Keeping your browser up-to-date can help protect you from known vulnerabilities that may be exploited by popup ads.
Use a private browsing mode : Using a private browsing mode can help protect your online activities from being tracked.
Report popup ads : Reporting popup ads to Facebook can help them identify and block these ads.
Conclusion
Stopping popup ads on Facebook is a simple process that requires a combination of ad blockers, browser extensions, disabling cookies, and using a VPN. By following these methods, you can eliminate popup ads on Facebook and enjoy a more seamless browsing experience. Remember to always use reputable antivirus software, keep your browser up-to-date, and report popup ads to Facebook to help them improve their ad-blocking features.
Table: Summary of Methods
Method
Description
Ad Blockers
Block ads from loading on your browser
Browser Extensions
Block ads using browser extensions
Disabling Cookies
Disable cookies on your browser
Using a VPN
Encrypt your internet traffic and mask your IP address
Bullets: Additional Tips
‚Ä¢ Use a reputable antivirus software
‚Ä¢ Keep your browser up-to-date
‚Ä¢ Use a private browsing mode
‚Ä¢ Report popup ads to Facebook

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: CEA Anantha Nageswaran has a message for global rating agencies after surprise 8% growth
text:
Chief economic advisor V Anantha Nageswaran said the estimate-beating 8.4% growth in the third quarter makes a compelling case for an upgrade by global rating agencies in their FY24 forecasts to at least 7%.
"Overall, the economy ticks many boxes in the right way...so there is a case for international agencies to reappraise their estimate of potential GDP growth in India closer to 7 percent, if not above," he said.
In a virtual presser after the NSO pegged FY24 growth forecast for India at 7.6%, Nageswaran said private investments will likely gain further traction in the next fiscal.
There is evidence of sustained investment activity in the economy, the CEA said, pointing at the rise in imports of capital goods, expansion in manufacturing capacity utilisation and increasing investment by private non-financial companies.
Terming India as an outlier, Nageswaran said the growth rate for the December quarter eclipsed that of China (5.2%), Indonesia (5%), the US (3.1%), Mexico (2.5), Japan (1%) and France (0.7%).
With growth of 8.1%, 8.2% and 8.4% in the first three quarters, India remains the fastest growing large economy by a distance.üëèFY 2023-24 growth can be close to 8%! @narendramodi @PMOIndia @nsitharaman @nsitharamanoffc @FinMinIndia
India must aim for consistent 8% GDP growth in‚Ä¶
‚Äî Prof. Krishnamurthy V Subramanian (@SubramanianKri) February 29, 2024 \n\n
"So the actual performance of the economy has continued to defy expectations and do better than what many had projected underscoring the fact that a structural transformation of the economy is indeed underway, both in terms of physical infrastructure and digital infrastructure as well as inclusion agenda, boosting the purchasing power of Indian households...," Nageswaran said.
On the agriculture sector, he said prospects of healthy rabi harvesting, and expectations of the fading away of El Nino and the forecast of a normal monsoon bodes well for a better-than-normal kharif sowing.
He further said that improvement in household consumption, bright prospects for capital formation owing to an upturn in the private capex cycle, improved business sentiments, healthy balance sheets of corporates, and the government's continued thrust on capital expenditure will drive growth.

author: Shreya Ghosh
title: Slogans calling for rebuilding of Babri Masjid surface at JNU | Delhi News - Times of India
text: NEW DELHI: Ahead of the scheduled inauguration of Ram Mandir in Ayodhya next month, slogans demanding the rebuilding of Babri Masjid have surfaced on the walls of the Language Study Centre at Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU).Photos of the graffiti, which was discovered by students on Wednesday night, were widely shared on social media on Thursday. The slogans appear above the name of the National Students' Union of India (NSUI), the Congress's student wing.However, NSUI distanced itself from the controversy, with its JNU unit president Sudhanshu Shekhar pointing out that the organisation's name was already present in black marker and the slogans were added later in red marker. Shekhar alleged that this was an attempt to tarnish NSUI's image and called for stringent action from the JNU administration.JNU's chief security officer Naveen Yadav said he was unaware of the incident. He said that slogans targeting a specific caste had also been written a few months ago, but no investigation had taken place. There was no immediate response from the JNU vice chancellor and the registrar.While anti-Brahmin slogans like 'There will be blood' were painted on the walls of the School of Languages and School of International Studies at the university last December, messages related to Kashmir were found two months ago.In October, Satish Garkoti, rector of JNU, said a committee to look into repeated incidents of \"anti-national\" slogans on its campus, adding, \"The committee is in consultation with the deans of different schools to install CCTVs in strategic locations in a phase-wise manner. The entire campus cannot have CCTV cameras.\"While the revised Chief Proctor Office manual has a provision of a fine of Rs 10,000 for writing controversial slogans, the Language Study Centre does not have CCTV coverage to check defacement of walls.

organizations.name: jnu | delhi news - times of india

author: MikeRivero
title: The Jewish establishments blindness to Palestinian slaughter also hurts U.S. Jews
text:
Jodi Rudoren of the Jewish Forward newspaper spent days reporting in Israel recently, and on December 20, Brian Lehrer of WNYC radio
asked her what Israelis think of the death toll in Gaza, which Lehrer said is ‚Äúunprecedented anywhere on earth in this century in this short a time.‚Äù
The Israelis don‚Äôt care, Rudoren said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs really not an active debate in Israel, among Jews anyway.‚Äù They are mourning and fearful, she said‚Äì then went on to rationalize the 20,000 killed. The death toll ‚Äúis totally staggering and hard to grapple with‚Ä¶ [but] we do need to keep in mind, that the international laws of war are not based on what the total death toll is, they‚Äôre based on the proportionality of the civilian casualties and collateral damage of each attack, and it takes a long time to figure that out in the fog of war.‚Äù
And therefore, ‚Äúit‚Äôs on the international community to pressure the Palestinians and the Arab world to provide some [diplomatic] alternatives that might work for Israel right now.‚Äù

author: Get News
title: Realtimecampaign.com Discusses Innovations and Challenges in Waterproofing Commercial Roofing New Orleans Residents Understand | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
In the dynamic and evolving landscape of New Orleans, the significance of robust commercial roofing cannot be overstated. This city, known for its vibrant culture and rich history, also faces unique challenges due to its geographical location. Heavy rainfall, humid conditions, and the occasional severe weather event make it imperative for buildings, especially commercial ones, to have durable, reliable, and waterproof roofing systems.
The Role of Waterproofing in Commercial Roofing
Waterproofing is a critical aspect of commercial roofing in New Orleans. It involves applying layers of specialized materials on the roof to prevent water penetration. This practice is not just about avoiding leaks; it's about protecting the structural integrity of the building, preserving the indoor environment, and ensuring the safety and comfort of its occupants. In New Orleans, where weather conditions can be harsh and unpredictable, effective waterproofing is essential for long-term building maintenance and resilience.
Innovative Solutions and Materials
The market for commercial roofing materials and solutions has seen significant innovation in recent years. Materials like thermoplastic polyolefin (TPO) and ethylene propylene diene monomer (EPDM) are becoming popular choices for their durability, flexibility, and resistance to extreme weather conditions. These materials are not only effective in waterproofing but also contribute to energy efficiency by reflecting sunlight and reducing heat absorption.
In the context of large-scale projects, the $40 Million Roof Replacement Project Underway at New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center stands as a testament to the city's commitment to modernizing and protecting its key infrastructures. This project highlights the importance of investing in high-quality roofing systems that can withstand the unique climatic challenges of the region.
Companies like Roofing Solutions that focus on sustainability are also gaining traction. Green roofing systems, which involve the use of vegetation and soil, not only provide excellent waterproofing but also help in reducing urban heat islands and improving air quality. These solutions are particularly relevant in urban settings like New Orleans, where environmental concerns are increasingly shaping construction practices.
According to realtimecampaign.com, the importance of regular maintenance and inspection of commercial roofs cannot be understated. Regular checks can identify potential issues before they escalate, ensuring that the roofing system remains effective and durable. This proactive approach to roof maintenance is crucial in a city like New Orleans, where the climate can quickly turn a small problem into a significant concern.
Challenges and Considerations
One of the major challenges in commercial roofing in New Orleans is balancing cost with quality. While budget constraints are a reality for many businesses, skimping on roofing materials and installation can lead to higher costs in the long run due to frequent repairs and replacements. It's essential for building owners and managers to consider any additional info like lifespan and performance of roofing materials, not just their initial cost.
Another consideration is the architectural style of New Orleans. The city is famous for its historic buildings, and any roofing solution needs to be in harmony with the aesthetic character of the area. This requires roofing contractors to be knowledgeable not only about the latest waterproofing technologies but also about the local architecture and historic preservation guidelines.
The importance of effective waterproofing in commercial roofing in New Orleans cannot be overstated. With the right materials, innovative solutions, and a proactive approach to maintenance, businesses can ensure that their buildings are protected against the elements. This not only preserves the physical structure but also contributes to the safety, comfort, and productivity of the people who use these spaces. As New Orleans continues to grow and evolve, the role of high-quality, sustainable, and resilient roofing solutions becomes increasingly vital, as evidenced by major initiatives like the roofing project at the Ernest N. Morial Convention Center.

title: El 1x1 del Baskonia: Costello acusa su inactividad
text:
5 Miller-McIntyre De sus noches m√°s flojas de los √∫ltimos tiempos. De hecho, estuvo en el banquillo m√°s tiempo del habitual. Desconectado del partido. Ni anot√≥ ni hizo jugar al equipo.
5 Marinkovic Anot√≥ alguna canasta meritoria en el segundo cuarto, aunque el equipo compiti√≥ mejor sin escoltas peque√±os en pista. Sufri√≥ lo indecible cada vez que Voigtmann le poste√≥.
4 D√≠ez El principal damnificado del g√©lido inicio protagonizado por el Baskonia. Sus malas defensas a Voigtmann y un error en un triple liberado le condenaron al banquillo.
7 Sedekerskis Nuevamente de lo mejor del equipo al quedarse a un solo rebote de las dobles figuras. Su presencia no fue suficiente para neutralizar la desventaja f√≠sica ante el Armani. Poste√≥ m√°s de lo que es habitual.
4 Kotsar Intrascendente en el Mediolanum Forum. Vivi√≥ un calvario en el juego interior ante el veterano Hines. Fall√≥ sus cuatro tiros de dos y tan solo anot√≥ dos tiros libres.
6 Moneke Su estad√≠stica es bastante enga√±osa, ya que mejor√≥ sus n√∫meros en los minutos de la basura. Tampoco tuvo su mejor d√≠a ante un Armani muy superior bajo el tablero.
4 Howard Un d√≠a aciago, tanto en ataque como en defensa. Firm√≥ una err√°tica carta de tiro y su desventaja f√≠sica le jug√≥ una mala pasada al Baskonia en todos los emparejamientos.
6 Costello Acus√≥ su inactividad durante muchos minutos, aunque mejor√≥ su rendimiento con el transcurrir del partido. Mala carta de tiro desde el 6,75 y no siempre acert√≥ en las situaciones ofensivas de ‚Äòpick and roll‚Äô.
6 Chiozza Luces y sombras. Mostr√≥ su buena visi√≥n de juego con siete asistencias, pero en el lado negativo de la balanza no genera ninguna amenaza a nivel individual en ataque y pierde balones inocentes.
6 Rogkavopoulos Con el alero griego en pista, la actividad defensiva subi√≥ muchos enteros gracias a su envergadura. En ataque no pudo erigirse en protagonista, aunque al menos anot√≥ cuatro tiros libres sin fallo.
6 Diop El factor sorpresa en el √∫ltimo cuarto. Aport√≥ energ√≠a al equipo en defensa y tambi√©n en la lucha por el rebote ofensivo, aunque estuvo impreciso desde la personal con dos errores en tres intentos.
